name: -webkit-perspective-origin
description: Sets the origin of the -webkit-perspective property.
longDescription:
Sets the origin of the -webkit-perspective property described in "-webkit-perspective."

This property effectively sets the x and y position at which the viewer appears to be looking at the children of the element. The default value is 50% for both x and y coordinates.

<posx>.description: The x-origin as a percentage or value.

values.center: Sets the x or y origin to the center of the element’s border box. If this constant appears before left or right, specifies the y-origin. If it appears after top or bottom, specifies the x-origin. If appears alone, centers both the x and y origin.
values.left: Sets the x-origin to the left side of the border box.
values.right: Sets the x-origin to the right side of the border box.

<posy>.description: The y-origin as a percentage or value.

values.center: Sets the x or y origin to the center of the element’s border box. If this constant appears before left or right, specifies the y-origin. If it appears after top or bottom, specifies the x-origin. If appears alone, centers both the x and y origin.
values.top: Sets the y-origin to the top of the element’s border box.
values.bottom: Sets the y-origin to the bottom of the element’s border box.
